problem_text_cn: 如图,将一根绳子用线段AB表示,现从C处将绳子剪断,剪断后的两段绳子中较长的一段为60cm,若AC=\frac{3}{4}CB,则这条绳子的原长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a rope is represented by line segment AB. Now the rope is cut from C. The longer of the two ropes after cutting is N_0. If AC = \frac{N_1}{N_2}CB, then the original length of the rope is ()
